text: Motion
Fuyuko, thanks.
...You're always so abrupt, you know.
Haha, sorry.
Motion

So, what is it...?
I'll hear you out.

I was thinking that it was thanks to your efforts
that Asahi was able to recover.
...Hmmmm?
Well, I won't deny that Fuyu played a part in it...

But it wasn't all Fuyu's work... There were also Mei
and a certain someone who supported Fuyu.

Right... But if Fuyuko wasn't involved,
I don't think Asahi would be nearly as lively as she is right now.

So, I wanted to express my gratitude once again.
Thank you.

...She's our center after all.
If she's not on form, it'll be problematic for Fuyu.

So is that all...? Since your expressing your gratitude, 
surely you also plan to express your thanks through action as well.

Fufuu, how exciting.
I wonder what Fuyu's producer will do for her.

...Oh right! There's a sweets buffet that Fuyu has been
wanting to go to. How about having a debriefing there?
Eh...uh.

What...? You also played a part in all of this, so the least you can do
is properly attend... and it'll be your treat, of course.

So that's settled then, right?
Producer-sanâ™¡
